problem.markdown:
Mini Quiz (no graded) - Introduction to Trainingland
====
>>Trainingland has been created to demonstrate: (select one or more)<< [x] Data collection forms [x] Data Analysis [x] Indicators
[explanation] Trainingland is part of the training environment that has been created in order for users to learn how DHIS 2 is structured and how information can be collected and reviewed. It uses modeled data that allows users to learn some of the fundamentals of DHIS 2 functionality. [explanation]
